verses.text: \w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* unable \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w gave|strong="H7121"\w* \w orders|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bring|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w books|strong="H5612"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* recorded \w memorable|strong="H2146"\w* \w deeds|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w read|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w It|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w* how \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* furnished information \w regarding|strong="H5921"\w* Bigthan \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w Teresh|strong="H8657"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s attendants \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w guarded|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* entrance \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* palace, \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* attempted \w to|strong="H7971"\w* kill \w King|strong="H4428"\w* Ahasuerus.

‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w dignity|strong="H1420"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w conferred|strong="H1697"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w*?’ \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w*. \w When|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s pages \w who|strong="H5288"\w* \w waited|strong="H8334"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* replied ‘\w Nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*,’

\w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said, ‘\w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*?’ \w Now|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* just entered \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w outer|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* speak \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w hanging|strong="H8518"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w gallows|strong="H6086"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5975"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s pages said \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w him|strong="H5975"\w*, ‘\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w*, \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.’ \w The|strong="H5975"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said, ‘Let \w him|strong="H5975"\w* \w enter|strong="H5975"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* entered, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, ‘\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w man|strong="H3820"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wishes|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*?’ \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w himself|strong="H3820"\w*, ‘\w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w besides|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w could|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wish|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*?’

So \w he|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2001"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, ‘\w For|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H2001"\w* man whom \w the|strong="H2001"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wishes|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*

\w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w* \w be|strong="H5414"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w*, \w which|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w worn|strong="H3847"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H5483"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w ridden|strong="H7392"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* whose \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w diadem|strong="H5921"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* been \w placed|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w charge|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w one|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w noble|strong="H6579"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*. \w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wishes|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w lead|strong="H7392"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w*, \w proclaiming|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, “\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wishes|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.”’

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w*, ‘\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w*, \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jew|strong="H3064"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w sits|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*. Omit \w nothing|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w*.’

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w horse|strong="H5483"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w* \w through|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w square|strong="H7339"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w proclaimed|strong="H7121"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w wishes|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w honour|strong="H3366"\w*.’

\w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w but|strong="H7725"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w hurried|strong="H1765"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, mourning, \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w covered|strong="H2645"\w*.

\w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w recounted|strong="H5608"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* friends \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w happened|strong="H7136"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5307"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w Zeresh|strong="H2238"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* wife said \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, ‘\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w Mordecai|strong="H4782"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* already \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w humiliated|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jewish|strong="H3064"\w* \w people|strong="H3808"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w can|strong="H3201"\w* \w do|strong="H3201"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.’

\w While|strong="H5750"\w* \w they|strong="H6213"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s attendants \w came|strong="H5060"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* quickly \w took|strong="H4428"\w* \w Haman|strong="H2001"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* Esther \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w prepared|strong="H6213"\w*.
